title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message:
hello i have a2159 apple logo (bootloop)
itried dfu mode but cant detect by configurator2
got 20v usb meter.
btw board is clean no sign of corossion.
PPBUS_G2H 12.6v
PP3V3_G3H 3.3V
P3V3MAIN_PGOOD 3.2V
PP3V_G3H_RTC 3.0V
P5VG3S_EN 1.8V
PP5V_G3S 5.1V

PP1V2_AWAKE 1.2v
PP1V8_AWAKE 1.8v
PP3V3_AWAKE 3.3v

PP0V8_SLPS2R 0.8v
PP1V8_SLPS2R 1.8v
PP1V1_SLPS2R 1.1v

PMU_PVDDMAIN_EN 3.3v

PP1V8_S3_MEM 1.8v
PP1V2_S3 0.0v with 0.125 diode to ground is it normal?

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message:
U8100
12 5.1v
6 1.8v
16 1.8v
17 1.8v
after i measured this now  got 
PP1V2_S3 1.2v with 0.125 diode to ground
but still bootloop.

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message:
im sorry for my stupidity, i press keys wrongly now i tried revive and restore success with no errors
please check on the video [URL='https://youtu.be/s1vsiQjPwOU']revive restore[/URL] after this now no more display dont know whats the next step

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message: When restore is done, Mac should continue with fresh installation.

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message:
yes but this after the restore no display if u checked the video u can see the screen of other macbook looping the usb connection. 
any idea?

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message: Did you try all options available on Apple Configurator 2?

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message:
[ATTACH type="full"]60087[/ATTACH]
other option showing this error

title: (SOLVED) 820-01598 bootloop
message:
this solved after no more option thing to do i decided to spray the entire motherboard with electronic cleaner then 
i reheat to make it dry using quick 2008 hotair 240/100 
suddenly miracle happens.
